located in the West Pennine Moors.
Leyland station is on the West Coast Mainline and offers direct services from and to Preston, with links to Chorley, Wigan and Liverpool

value: hours=Open 23rd March to 3rd November 2013. Saturdays, Sundays, and Bank Holidays also Thursdays and Fridays during school holidays & throughout July and August.
content=The British Commercial Vehicle Museum in Leyland Lancashire has for the past twenty years been dedicated to preserving the history of the road transport industry in the UK.
